string-array.name: dessert_title
string-array.item: Ice cream Cake
Strawberry Cake
Sponge Cake
Coffee Cake
Donuts
Chocolate Cake
Swiss Roll
Spring roll

string-array.name: dessert_description
string-array.item: Ice cream cake is made with vanilla, mint, oreo or chocolate ice cream
Strawberry cake is topped with fresh ripe strawberries
Sponge cake is served with cheddar cheese
Coffee cake tastes better than coffee
Donuts are glazed and sprinkled with candy
Chocolate cake made with cadbury chocolate
Swiss roll served hot with a complementary drink
Spring roll are spread with nutella

string-array.name: store_title
string-array.item: Garden City
Two Rivers
Westgate
Sarit
Junction Mall
The Hub

string-array.name: store_description
string-array.item: Located at the prestigious Garden City mall, enjoy our assorted desserts and famous signature milkshakes as you shop around. Read more…
Want to feel like royalty? Enter our store located in Two Rivers. Get service like no other. The british experience mixed with our own. Read more…
At the heart of House, come enjoy milkshakes that are to die for served with desserts of your liking. Dare to taste your wildest dreams.Ream more…
Elegance at its best at our Sarit branch. Enjoy pastries with a view of the city. See the night come alive. Read more…
Located at the roof top of Junction Mall, enjoy the fine dining with our cuisines. An amazing view of the vicinity while taking your taste buds through a journey of discovery. Read more…
Conveniently located at the centre of The Hub, enjoy an array of flavours of desserts and pastries. Read more…
